steps.name: Then updated quantity is reflected on cart page
When the user clicks the checkout button after viewing the order summary on Cart Page
Then the order summary on the Checkout page should match the summary on the Cart page
When User should provides shipping information like Valid First Name, Last Name,Addressline1 Addressline2,city,state,zipcode,email and Phone number
Then the order summary on the payment review page should match that of its previous pages
